name: IdeaVim
description:
Vim emulation plugin for IntelliJ Platform-based IDEs.


IdeaVim supports many Vim features including normal/insert/visual modes, motion keys, deletion/changing, marks, registers, some Ex commands, Vim regexps, configuration via ~/.ideavimrc, macros, Vim plugins, etc.


See also:

  • GitHub repository: documentation and contributing
  • Issue tracker: feature requests and bug reports
notes:
Features:

  • Support NERDTree extension VIM-1042 | NERDTree
  • Support maxmapdepth option to define the maximum depth of mappings

Fixes:

  • VIM-2202 Fix macro recording for ex command and search
  • VIM-1799 VIM-1794 Special characters are not interpreted on yanking
  • VIM-2218 Fix some shortcuts for 2021.+
  • VIM-2217 Fix adding new line at the end of the file for the AppCode
  • VIM-2220 Do not try to get a commandState for null editor
  • VIM-2153 Fix storing special characters after IDE closing

Merged PRs:

  • 269 by 大牙(Henry Zhu): fix invalid link of submodule docs
